name: The Ball Lost In The Ocean
name_original: The Ball Lost In The Ocean
description:
You Are A Ball Who Is Lost In The Middle Of The Ocean On Abandoned Bridges.

A Rescue Helicopter Was Sent For You, And You Must Complete An Obstacle Course Which Stretches Over A Series Of Levels To Get To The Helicopter In The Shortest Time Possible!

You Can Not Jump In This Game, However You Can Roll On Walls To Climb Them Up! You Must Use This Ability To Avoid Spikes, "Stick" To Moving Platforms And More!

On Your Way To The Helicopter, You Also Get Some Money Depending On How Fast You Can Beat The Levels, And You Can Use It To Buy Some Cool Skins At The Shop! They Dont Help You Get To The Helicopter Faster, However They Do Make You Look Cool 😎.

You Also Unlock An Endless Mode When You Finally Reach The Helicopter, Where You Need To Climb An Infinite Wall As Far As You Can While Avoiding Spikes! It Also Gives You More Money Depending On How Far You Made It, Which Is Pretty Neat!

(Most) Textures From: https://ambientcg.com/

Day And Noon Skyboxes From: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/sky/free-hdr-sky-612...

Night Skybox Generated Using: https://tools.wwwtyro.net/space-3d/index.html#animationSpeed=1&fov=80&nebulae=true&pointStars=true&resolution=1024&seed=lisbpoyrxg0&stars=true&sun=true

Source Code: https://github.com/GuyMakesStuff/TBLITO-Source
